results.text: Strangely Jointed Limbs: Your Limbs have extra joints that articulate strangely. Gain Contortionist Skill as a Trained Basic Skill, or gain Talented (Contortionist) Talent if you already have the skill.
Elongated Form: You become incredibly tall and thin, permenantely lose 1d5 Toughness. Reroll if you have the Bloated Form Mutation
Pale and Hairless Flesh: Your Skin is a pale white, marbled with veins, and without any hair.
Eyes as Dark as the Void: Your eyes are completely black, with no iris. Gain the Dark Sight Trait.
Withered Form: Your Body becomes withered as your flesh hangs from your bones. Permenantely reduce Strength by 10 and halve movement rates. Reroll if you have the Bloated Form Mutation.
Bloated Form: Your Body becomes grossly bloated and your limbs thicken. Gain +5 Wounds and the Sturdy Trait, but you may no longer run. Reroll if you have Elongated Form or Withered Form Mutation.
Membranous Growths: Membranes grow between your skin and digits, sagging and folding from your flesh. Suffer permenant -5 to Fellowship.
Inhuman Visage: Your face is devoid of human features, your nose is a pair of slits, ears are small holes, and eyes are unblinking. Gain Fear (1) Trait.
Fingers like Talons: Your fingerbones grow into sharp and hardened talons. Gain Natural Weapons Trait.
Teeth as Sharp as Needles: Your Mouth fills with hundreds of fine, pointed teeth. Gain Natural Weapons Trait, suffer permenant -5 to Fellowship.
Disturbing Grace: You move with an unpleasent yet fluid grace. Gain Unnatural Agility (x2) Trait.
Strange Vitality: Your wounds bleed a translucent fluid, close quickly, and sickeningly knit back together even after being horrifically broken. Gain Regeneration Trait.

Unnatural Presence: Those around you feel unpleasent sensations, a clawing touch, an invisible pressure, a metallic tang, or so on. -10 to positive social interactions, +10 to intimitating or fear-inducing interactions.
